short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert any page into Dark Mode, or its inverted relative

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform any webpage into Dark Mode effortlessly.

Experience a sleek and eye-friendly browsing experience as this extension intelligently inverts colors while preserving the clarity of media elements such as images, videos, and SVGs.

Your feedback is always welcome to help keeping this extension as good as possible.
